maml:description.maml:para: Converts a decimal number to string representation of hexadecimal equivalent
Converts a decimal number to string representation of binary equivalent
Converts a string representation of hexadecimal or binary number to a decimal number. Only deals with positive integers
Tests a string to determine if a binary number
Tests a string to determine if a hex number
Adds two binary numbers together and returns a string representation of the result in binary
Subtracts second binary number from first binary number and returns a string representation of the result in binary
second value - this is always subtracted from first value

maml:description.maml:para: Adds two hex numbers together and returns a string representation of the result in hex
